item.description:
Frog Appreciation Day

The Boston Common Frog Pond is partnering with Zoo New England's Franklin Park Zoo on August 20 for the first annual Frog Appreciation Day, a family-friendly event aimed at educating young people about frogs here and around the world, and the importance of protecting animal habitats.

There will be face painting, arts and crafts tables where children can make beanbag frogs, live music, and giveaways of free children's tickets to Zoo New England's Franklin Park Zoo.

Zoo New England's Education Department, members of the national Frogwatch initiative, will conduct an interactive question and answer session all about frogs.
item.name: Frog Appreciation Day at Boston Common
